page.title: 04Great Links Tor
page.content: {Great Links Tor } is possibly the most imposing tor in the block. It is best viewed from the the east where the towers of granite that crown it have their most imposing aspect. The tor rises to 586 metres. Approched from {Dicks Well}the climb is not so steep as when coming from the west. Just on the edge of the block near Great Links Tor one can see the remains of a house. This is called{Bleak House,}and was erected in connection with peat workings. All that remains of the house now though is part of the walls. It is an evocative sight against the grandure of the tors to find a house in such a remote spot. If the wind does not blow you over the view from Great Links Tor is magnificent.
